personal.name: Ashfaq Nabi
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Developer

about.description: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web and AI-driven applications using React, Node.js, and OpenAI APIs. Proven track record of delivering enterprise-grade solutions that reduce operational costs by 35% and achieve 95% system reliability. Specialized in workflow automation, prompt engineering, and modern SaaS development.

projects.title: LinkVault - URL Shortening Service
projects.description: A modern, full-stack URL shortening service built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. LinkVault provides enterprise-grade features including analytics, password protection, and user management with real-time tracking capabilities.
projects.impact: Built scalable URL shortening platform with 95% uptime, supporting unlimited users with enterprise security features

projects.title: Intelligent Workflow Automation System

projects.impact: Reduced operational costs by 35% for 50+ companies

projects.title: AI Chatbot Framework
